name: Baptism of Fever
description:
Baptism of Fever is Exciting debut album from Orchid Fever a 3 piece Rock band from Gloucester, with male/ female vocals, playing a mix of Alternative Rock, Punk and Blues. The band comprises of Naomi Hill on bass and vocals, Olly Smith on guitar and vocals and Alex Talwar on Drums. Baptism of Fever was recorded late 2009 with Robert Plant & Status Quo & producer John David at Berry Hill Studios in the Forest of Dean. Their sound could be described as alternative rock with elements of blues & 70â€™s punk with strong melodic edge. 

Track List:

1. Zen Slide
2. Take No Shelter
3. Servitude
4. Twilight Fade
5. Expected to Lie
6. Tarot Blues
7. Send Me the Letter
8. Penny
9. White Room
10. Vortex
11. Sun Goes Under
12. Over & Beyond
